name: Pear Tree Inn San Antonio Northeast

reviews.text: Let me say right off.....if you need a handicap room this is NOT the motel for you!
reviews.title: Clean, but that's all!

reviews.text: I've stayed a a lot of Drurys and made the mistake of thinking the Pear Tree by Drury would at least be OK. Wrong. I was attending a conference and needed something in the $80-$90 price range so I could get reimbursed.
reviews.title: Great stay in SA!

likes.disliked: — Slow elevator, but not a hassle.

reviews.text: This motel has exterior doors, but the elevators are in the center of the property. Their are a few rooms off the lobby, but you can't get to them without going halfway around the property and using the elevator, walking past 10 or so rooms, back through a keyed door to the interior lobby. Go figure!
reviews.title: We enjoyed our stay

likes.liked: — free breakfast, snack, itnterne, kitchenette, value

reviews.text: The desk clerk checked me into the wrong room and let me drag all my luggage into the lobby, to only tell me you can't get to that room (I could see it on the 2nd floor) without going around to the elevator.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

likes.disliked: — The traffic noise from I.H. 35, the train

reviews.text: Overall, I was expecting a little more than a cheap bottom of the barrel property.
reviews.title: Good room, great service
Pear Tree Felt Like a Budget Hotel
reviews.text: We requested an interior, quiet room. We received an exterior, loud room. It was close to I-35 and train tracks, and noise from both were very difficult to sleep through. The room smelled badly - possibly from pets. The hotel was full and the front desk staff was unable to move us. They were courteous and comped the night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second night we were indoors in a small king room. Much quieter. The bed linens in both rooms were worn and blankets had cigarette burns, stains, etc. The tub didn't drain well and the room floor was a little dirty.
reviews.title: Clean,Clean,Clean! Drury Inn NE San Antonio

likes.disliked: — no bacon at breakfast, would prefer coke products not pepsi

reviews.text: The breakfast was good, but arrive early. The staff does not like to be asked for anything from 9:25 a.m. - on.
